display_name: [World Shrouded in Evil Power] Omega Shenron

kit.leader_skill: "Inhuman Deeds", "Power Absorption" or "GT Bosses" Category Ki +3, HP +200% and ATK & DEF +170%, plus an additional HP, ATK & DEF +50% for characters who also belong to the "Shadow Dragon Saga", "Worldwide Chaos" or "Battle of Fate" Category

super_attack.name: Dragon Flash Bullet
super_attack.effect: Raises DEF for 1 turn; Causes colossal damage to enemy; Greatly lowers ATK & DEF

ultra_super_attack.name: Demon Death Ball
ultra_super_attack.effect: Greatly raises DEF for 4 turns; Causes mega-colossal damage to all enemies; Disables enemy's action once; In the turn

passive_skill.name: Diabolical Abilities
passive_skill.effect: Activates the Entrance Animation when all allies are Extreme Class characters: (Once) Extreme Class allies' chance of performing a critical hit 20% up and randomly changes TEQ or AGL Ki Spheres to Rainbow Ki Spheres for 1 turn; (Once) Launches an additional Super Attack and Extreme Class allies' Ki +2 and ATK 70% up for 4 turns; (Once) Ki +3 and ATK & DEF 300% up; (Once) Receives an additional Ki +1 per Ki Sphere obtained; (Once) Damage reduction rate 50% up; (Once) Randomly changes PHY or INT Ki Spheres to Rainbow Ki Spheres; With a Rainbow Ki Sphere obtained: Extreme Class allies' DEF 70% up, plus an additional damage reduction rate 10% up for characters who also belong to the "GT Bosses" Category, for 2 turns; When attacking: ATK 150% up; When Ki is 18 or more: ATK 150% up when attacking; DEF 150% up when receiving an attack; When attacking with 24 Ki: Performs a critical hit; When receiving an Unarmed Super Attack: Great chance of nullifying it and countering with tremendous power; Nullifies it and counters with tremendous power when HP is 70% or less; After performing 5 or more attacks in battle: (Forever) Extreme Class allies' Ki +2 and chance of performing a critical hit 20% up; (Forever) Randomly changes TEQ or AGL Ki Spheres to Rainbow Ki Spheres starting from the character's next attacking turn

active_skill.name: Devastating Minus Energy
active_skill.effect: Creates the Domain; "Earth Shrouded in Minus Energy"; for 3 turns
active_skill.activation_conditions: Can be activated when there is another "Inhuman Deeds" "Power Absorption" or "GT Bosses" Category ally attacking in the same turn Or after the character performs 5 or more attacks in battle (once only) Domain Effect(s) Earth Shrouded in Minus Energy "Inhuman Deeds" "Power Absorption" or "GT Bosses" Category enemies' and allies' ATK +25% Increases damage received by Super Class enemies and allies by 20% Plus an additional 10% for characters who also belong to the "Earth-Protecting Heroes" "Fused Fighters" or "GT Heroes" Category
